linebreaks <- function(n){HTML(strrep(br(), n))}
#QUESTION 2 CALL FUNCTION
cohort <- function(year, rates, log=FALSE)
{
  xg <- diag(rates[, colnames(rates) >= year])
  names(xg) <- paste(year, rownames(rates)[1:length(xg)], sep="-x=")
  if(log)
    xg <- log(xg)
  xg
}
